item.title: How to think about MVC, MVP, PM, and MVVM?
item.author: Nghia
item.description: This article is about my personal explanation of the famous design patterns: Model View Controller (MVC), Model View Presenter (MVP), Presentation Model (PM), and Model View ViewModel (MVVM).
